attributes.action: do more about the 2 german shepherds killed for no reason
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the poor german shepherd dogs that was killed in the hot weather and the police officer saying he was suffering with depression so why was he in meetings that day if he was ill i have always backed gordan brown and now i want the same from him

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
